item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: 'This is not a hoax': Epstein survivors speak out demanding files be released
item.description: Several Jeffrey Epstein survivors made a direct appeal to President Trump to take action as they demanded all the files be released.

item.title: Critical DNA evidence to be allowed in Gilgo Beach serial killer case, judge rules

item.title: 1 killed, 3 injured in Wyoming mountains plane crash

item.title: WATCH: Wedding crasher steals $60,000 in gifts to bride and groom
item.description: Police are searching for a wedding crasher who stole about $60,000 in cash and checks intended for a Southern California bride and groom.
